meanings.definition: A type of weight used for exercise, typically consisting of a short bar with a weight on each end.
meanings.sent1: I lifted the dumbbell to strengthen my muscles.
meanings.sent2: She grabbed a dumbbell and started her workout routine.
meanings.sent3: The dumbbell rolled away from the fitness instructor, playing hard to get.
meanings.sent4: His determination was a heavy dumbbell, pushing him to reach his fitness goals.
meanings.sent5: The shiny dumbbell gleamed under the gym lights, calling out to be lifted.

meanings.sent1: Don't be a dumbbell and make the same mistake twice.
meanings.sent2: The movie character was portrayed as a lovable dumbbell.
meanings.sent3: The dumbbell in the comedy show always brought laughter with his silly antics.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a dumbbell for forgetting her keys inside the locked car.
meanings.sent5: Being a dumbbell in this situation will only lead to trouble.
